title: Boy from the block
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/HIV (Viruses)

abstract: 'Living with HIV, not dying from AIDS.'
description: Jeffery Robertson grew up in a tough neighbourhood where survival was a daily imperative. Later on in life, this survival instinct would kick in to fight discrimination in the community and to feed his will to live.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002218; Journeys into the unknown : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2008
